AbnormalEventAnomalyInsight.description: The insight for an abnormal event

cloudRoleName.description: The cloud role name for which the log was made

analysisStartTime.description: The start time of the analysis (in UTC)

analysisEndTime.description: The end time of the analysis (in UTC)

target.description: The source of the detected anomaly, for example: target URI of a dependency, name of a failed operation, or type of an exception

description.description: The description of the abnormal event

totalCount.description: The total count of log entries analyzed

failedCount.description: The count of failed log entries

anomalyTime.description: The time when the anomaly was detected (in UTC)

data.description: The details data, which could be user generated or system generated

insight.description: Insight about the anomaly, this is system generated

AbnormalEventType.description: The type of the abnormal event

values.name: Dependency
values.description: The abnormal event type is a dependency

values.name: Request
values.description: The abnormal event type is a request

values.name: Exception
values.description: The abnormal event type is an exception

AddedByType.description: The type of entity that added data to the issue

values.name: Manual
values.description: The data was added manually by a user

values.name: Automatic
values.description: The data was added automatically

AggregationType.description: The aggregation type of the metric

values.name: Average
values.description: The metric aggregation type is average

values.name: Minimum
values.description: The metric aggregation type is minimum

values.name: Maximum
values.description: The metric aggregation type is maximum

values.name: Total
values.description: The metric aggregation type is total

values.name: Count
values.description: The metric aggregation type is count

values.name: Unique
values.description: The metric aggregation type is unique, used for logs

values.name: None
values.description: There is no aggregation type

values.name: Increase
values.description: The anomaly direction is increasing

values.name: Decrease
values.description: The anomaly direction is decreasing

values.name: IncreaseAndDecrease
values.description: The anomaly direction is both increasing and decreasing

start.description: The start time of the range (in UTC)

end.description: The end time of the range (in UTC)

AvailabilityState.description: Represents the health state of a resource

values.name: Available
values.description: The resource is available

values.name: Degraded
values.description: The resource is degraded

values.name: Unavailable
values.description: The resource is unavailable

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The availability state of the resource is unknown

values.name: UserInitiated
values.description: The user initiated this state change

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Resource has been created.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Resource creation failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: Resource creation was canceled.

value.description: The IssueResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

filter.description: The filter to apply on the operation. For example, to filter by relevance, use "$filter=relevance eq 'Relevant'"

Origin.description: Details about the origin of the entity - the source that added it to the issue

addedBy.description: The ID of the origin - for example, in case of 'Manual', the object ID of the identity, and in case of 'Automatic', the name of the automatic system

addedByType.description: The source of the origin - Manual or Automatic

value.description: The RelatedAlert items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The RelatedResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

origin.description: The source that related the alert to the issue

addedAt.description: The time this relation was added to the issue (in UTC)

lastModifiedAt.description: The last update time of this relation (in UTC)

RelatedAlertAnomalyInsight.description: The insight for a related alert

firedTime.description: The time when the alert was fired (in UTC)

data.description: The details data, which could be user generated or system generated

insight.description: Insight about the anomaly, this is system generated

RelatedResource.description: Properties of a resource which is related to the issue

origin.description: The source that related the resource to the issue

availabilityState.description: The availability state of the resource

title.description: The title of the resource health event

summary.description: The summary of the resource health event

occurredTime.description: The time when the resource health event occurred (in UTC)

RunParameters.description: The parameters used to run the investigation

impactTime.description: The impact time to investigate (in UTC)

alerts.description: The alerts used to run the investigation

resources.description: The resources used to run the investigation

StartInvestigationParameters.description: Parameters provided to start an investigation operation

impactTime.description: The impact time to use for this investigation - by default, the impact time from the issue is used (in UTC)

investigationScopes.description: The scope of the investigation (resources and alerts) - by default, the resources and alerts related to the issue are used

values.name: New

values.name: InProgress

Summary.description: The text summary of the investigation entity

generatedMessage.description: A generated message that describes the anomalous trace pattern

pattern.description: The anomalous trace pattern that was detected in the Application Insights traces table

sampleEvent.description: The sample event of the trace pattern

count.description: The count of the trace occurrences

TransactionEdge.description: The edge of a transaction pattern

start.description: The textual identifier of the start node of the edge

end.description: The textual identifier of the end node of the edge

TransactionNode.description: The node of a transaction pattern

id.description: The textual identifier of the transaction participant's node

name.description: The name of the transaction pattern

generatedMessage.description: A generated message that describes the anomalous transaction pattern

targetNode.description: The textual identifier of the target of the anomalous transaction

nodes.description: The nodes of the transaction pattern

edges.description: The edges of the transaction pattern
